value:
What do I want out of my marriage?
I'd be happiest knowing the person I
love is also happy.

A member of the royal guard often
took to wearing some odd outfits...
They'd doubtless love this one.

Jagen, Cain, Abel, Draug, and
Gordin... I can't help but wonder what
they'd say if they saw me in this outfit.

I heard that Caeda attended a bridal
festival a little while ago. It sounds like
she had a wonderful time.

I'm not quite used to fighting on
horseback.$k$pI'll need the Altean knights to teach
me how to simultaneously wield my
weapon and control my horse.

I come with greetings of affection
from $Nf. May
you always be happy.

Ha, what a surprise! Could this
be the power of love?

I must become stronger to protect
those I love.

My apologies... It seems I must
refocus my efforts.

Why, thank you! It's like a
celebration is just for me.

Greetings. I am Prince Marth of Altea.
This outfit? It's a traditional groom's
outfit for a bridal festival, in which...$k$pWell... It's a bit hard to explain,
you see...

I've been told this outfit is what a man
wears when pledging his love to the
woman he loves.$k$pIn my heart, I already know the
woman I want by my side when I
make such a vow, but...$k$pWell, dressing in this outfit and
thinking about making such vows
somehow...makes me nervous.$k$pHa, I suppose wearing this has been
good practice. Now that I know how it
feels, I'll be ready for the real thing.$k$pAnd when that day comes, I'd be
honored to have you bear witness,
$Nu.
やぁっ！
それっ！
わわっ！
Not good...!
May love triumph!
I vow victory!
For those I love!
With all my heart!
Late for the ceremony...
ええと
What do you think? It's not...odd, is it?
There's some dust on my clothes? Would you be so kind as to help brush it off?
A festival is a brief respite for the soul.
This attire is...somewhat unsettling.
I wonder where the perfect place to hold a wedding is around here!
Someday, when peace returns... I hope to have a wedding of my own.
I hope I can continue to count on you.
Of course.
If only...
To happiness!
